responsibilities: Executed multi-channel social media campaigns, resulting in a 20% increase in cross-platform follower growth.
Managed the editorial calendar and coordinated with freelance writers to produce bi-weekly blog content.
Analyzed monthly campaign performance reports to optimize ad spend and improve lead generation quality.
Facilitated A/B testing for email marketing subject lines to increase open rates.
Conducted market research on competitor pricing and product positioning to support the sales team.
Assisted in the preparation of promotional materials for the annual regional tech conference.
Maintained and updated the company CRM database to ensure lead accuracy and contact segmentation.
